title: Your main champion becomes a Mortal Kombat character
body:
What would be his/her 2 fatalities?

{{champion:21}} 
1. Walks up from mid range, wraps one arm lightly around neck before blasting the face off. As she lets go, she bumps the victim with her hip so they fall to the ground.
2. Flips her hat skyward, then fires 5 bullets between both guns, blasting off both arms at the shoulders, both legs at the knees, finishing with a headshot. After the headshot, the hat lands perfectly on her head again and she smirks.

replies.body:
{{champion:14}} : Crushes their head with his fist. While screaming "COWARD!!!", of course.

Or he does his Q animation and cuts them in half with his axe. While screaming "COWARD!!!".

_OR_ he grabs them in both hands and roars "COWARD!!!" in their faces so loudly that their skin rips off of their body and they die.

I liked the second one, would be fitting as a mid range finisher.

First one would be even better if he had charged from far away into a leaping punch where the victim's head flies off.

Third would be best if he had simply shouted "COWARD!" at them, then they fly into the wall and splatter.
As long as they all include him screaming "COWARD!!!".
It's a requirement of anything related to Sion.
Eh, k. I'll go with it.

{{champion:119}} 
1. Gives his opponent a chance to escape, and just as his opponent thinks he is out of danger, he snipes it with an axe in the head
2. An extremely amazing fatality that I will probably always fail to make and just end up failing the combo and give them a lame kick instead 
https://openclipart.org/image/2400px/svg_to_png/222252/feels.png

so the input on the second would be up up down down back forward back forward holding block for B A then releasing block?

At that point, the description would be Draven shoving his hand into the victim, turning him into Draven Draven, at which point they do a mirrored pose and say "Welcome to Draven Kombat!"

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=GlcFuWrk,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-09-12T14:05:05.635+0000)
>
> up up down down back forward back forward holding block for B A then releasing block?


http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/glee/images/4/4b/MyBrainHurts.gif/revision/latest?cb=20130614191515
Dude, it should be obvious the Draven code would be used for the input.

{{champion:161}} 
1.  Mid range. Picks emery up with one tentacle, then throws them into the air, shoots plasma fission into the air, hitting the opposition in the chest, causing it and their two arms to explode, Then opens a rift to the void for their head to fall into.
2. Long range. Blasts the oppositions legs off with plasma fission, then its like the opening to his trailer, he float up to them, gets face to face, then melts them with life form disintegration ray.
{{champion:136}} (Had to do this guy too)
1. Close range. He laughs at the target, before throwing a star at them, causing them to explode, their head lands in his hand, and then he proceeds to crush it, like he did with that star at the end of his trailer.
2.Close range. He Creates a star behind the target and enlarges it, he then blasts them back into the star, and the star then melts them.

http://media.meme4u.com/invites/birthday-invitation/273-you-are-invited.gif

You are hereby invited to *The Men Who Giggle* discord server! It is a place to post dank memes, fan arts, and hang out with other dank individuals! If you are interested, respond to this comment with a yes when you are ready for the invite code!

{{champion:12}} 

Headbutt into the screen, smash style.

{{champion:35}} 
1- Pushes them slightly, putting them in range of a Jack in the Box nest. The boxes throw small spears the pierce the enemy body.

2- Comes really close to the enemy and pierces himself with both daggers, then explodes lauching daggers everywhere. After exploding the real Shaco appears laughing on the screen, letting us know that it was the clone who exploded.

BONUS:

Down Right Square - Throws a Shiv at the target
Up Down X - Becomes invisible and teleports behind the enemy
Right Left Circle - Places a box in the ground. If the enemy spets on it, deals damage.
Up Left Down Triangle - Changes the Shaco with the clone for a second, if the enemy hits it, it explodes.

If no fatalities are executed, uppon winning does the Worm Dance over the enemy's body.

Uh, MK went back to 2 dimensional fighting with MK9 and MKX.

So I would suggest D U FP (X button on Xbox by default) for Shaco to teleport behind the target Kung Lao style and apply an overhead.
And for the clone? Back Down BK (Circle button on PS controllers) where he would hold the stance and a clone would be hit instead of him, resulting in a short range explosion of damage.

{{champion:98}} He already is, so this is easy.

1: Uses his spirit sword to detonate their spirit, causing their body to explode into paste.

2. Dashes through his enemy, ripping a hole through them and pulling his spirit sword through them so they adorn it.
Liu Kang already does the first one.
